Adding Types

Throughout the course .ts/.tsx files were used by types mostly omitted. As a challenge, try to add types to the application. There are many correct ways to do this. Check out the typescript branch for one possibly solution.

In the solution, you see a few TypeScript comments for server components:

{
  /* @ts-expect-error Server Component */
}
<Greetings />;

This is a workaround for end-to-end type safety with server compoents. See the Next.js Beta Docs for more information.
